title: Vehicle registrations zoom 21% in December
description: This growth in monthly registrations was a sharp pickup from the previous two years when the numbers had dropped - by 5.4% in December 2022 and 16.6% in December 2021. It has been driven by robust supply of vehicles, better promotional offers and increased consumer appetite to buy new cars, according to industry insiders.
